content: HDI-TZ Drop-in anchor Ultimate-performance drop-in concrete anchor for standard embedment depths in cracked/ uncracked concrete and seismic applications (carbon steel, zinc plated) 3/8” – 5/8” ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Higher productivity - designed for reduced setting time and effort, and faster installations when paired with the HDI- TZ 2-in-1 setting tool and a hammer drill Increased performance – drop-in anchor with optimized length for more reliable fastenings in standard reinforced slabs and composite metal deck slabs Code compliant - ICC-ESR approved for cracked/ uncracked concrete and seismic Virtually dust-free – pair with Hilti Dust Removal System (DRS) for compliance with Table 1 of OSHA 1926.1153 regulations for silica dust exposure Easier to specify and design – pair with PROFIS Engineering software to simplify the design of concrete connections and reduce material costs Applications Post-installed fastening point for suspended pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, seismic bracing, and other overhead elements Suitable for use in cracked and uncracked concrete including seismic areas ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | PROFIS Software | Yes | Installation tools | TE 6-22 Cordless rotary hammer ### ITEMS- 2351768 -
